Title: ok
Cons: shutter opens when in your pants, slower time to shoot
Pros: nice large screen, battery keeps on going and going and going, just can't wear it out.

Title: Great for reefkeepers
Cons:
It's average quality for a compact camera.  You pay for the features, only buy this if the features sound good to you.

You still need an SLR if you want excellent photos.
Pros:
WATERPROOF!!!  SHOCKPROOF!!! Pocket friendly.  Perfect for camping, beaches, canoing/tubing, bar hopping!

This is my new compact camera for parties and walking around.
Comments: I bought this for photographing my coral in my reeftank, works beautifully for getting great macro photography underwater that rivals a $1200+ setup w/ lens.  Not to mention a macro lens can never get the angles this camera can do underwater, it's magical, simply magical.
